item.title: Elevation profile of Spain in R
item.description: From Picos de Europa to Sierra Nevada # Have you ever wondered what would be of Spain if you cut it in half? What is there after Despeñaperros? Which is taller, meseta norte or meseta sur? How come Ávila is the highest capital province in Spain?! I did, and here is the result: Indeed, after Despeñaperros, there is a big hole. Here are some tips to your elevation profile in R
